launched.title: Otio App
launched.description: Otio App is an online ticketing platform for tasting events, allowing businesses to create and manage events, sell tickets, and handle payments through Stripe. It provides a seamless experience for both organizers and customers, with tools for event scheduling, booking management, and automated notifications.

launched.title: Neumatrans Dashboard
launched.description: Dashboard for managing operations at Neumatrans workshop. It covers customers, vehicles, repairs, and invoicing, with automated email updates on their repairs and AI powered statistical insights.

launched.title: TLOZ fight game
launched.description: A fighting game of Link from 'The Legend Of Zelda' against an Ocktorock made with SFML library. It has it's animations, mechanics, collisions, target tracking, and more.

launched.title: 3D Sandbox
launched.description: A 3D playground built on Three.js for testing and exploring game mechanics, shaders, textures, models, physics simulations, animations, and interactive elements.

inProgress.title: BitBot
inProgress.description: For now my bot uses DeepSeek AI to scrape and analyze financial news for real-time investment advice. In the future, I'll integrate an open-source AI like Llama for analysis, while DeepSeek will handle decision-making on the best stock market to invest in. Itâ€™ll also automate investments, optimizing both the amount and timing.
